availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oscar F. Sturman (Jefferson County, Kentucky, lawyer.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky, native. Married to Ellen "Ella" Fuller Sturman in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on November 2, 1859. Father of Charles Fuller Sturman. Attorney in Daviess County in 1850. Attorney in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Davies County, Owensboro, p. 354B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 248.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Ward 4, p. 351B-352A..
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000819611, p. 500.
